Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

resource.description: The AWS::EC2::VerifiedAccessEndpoint resource creates an AWS EC2 Verified Access Endpoint.

properties.name: ApplicationDomain
properties.description: The DNS name for users to reach your application.

type.description: The DNS name for users to reach your application.

properties.name: AttachmentType
properties.description: The type of attachment used to provide connectivity between the AWS Verified Access endpoint and the application.

type.description: The type of attachment used to provide connectivity between the AWS Verified Access endpoint and the application.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description for the AWS Verified Access endpoint.

type.description: A description for the AWS Verified Access endpoint.

properties.name: DomainCertificateArn
properties.description: The ARN of a public TLS/SSL certificate imported into or created with ACM.

type.description: The ARN of a public TLS/SSL certificate imported into or created with ACM.

properties.name: EndpointDomainPrefix
properties.description: A custom identifier that gets prepended to a DNS name that is generated for the endpoint.

type.description: A custom identifier that gets prepended to a DNS name that is generated for the endpoint.

properties.name: EndpointType
properties.description: The type of AWS Verified Access endpoint. Incoming application requests will be sent to an IP address, load balancer or a network interface depending on the endpoint type specified.The type of AWS Verified Access endpoint. Incoming application requests will be sent to an IP address, load balancer or a network interface depending on the endpoint type specified.

type.description: The type of AWS Verified Access endpoint. Incoming application requests will be sent to an IP address, load balancer or a network interface depending on the endpoint type specified.The type of AWS Verified Access endpoint. Incoming application requests will be sent to an IP address, load balancer or a network interface depending on the endpoint type specified.
